DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase I, open-label, multi-centre study designed to assess the safety and tolerability of Cediranib in combination with lomustine in patients with primary recurrent malignant brain tumour.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I : Cediranib in Combination With Lomustine Chemotherapy in Recurrent Malignant Brain Tumour
DOC.criteria: Primary recurrent malignant brain tumour for whom lomustine would be standard therapy diagnosis & stage Patients received no more than 2 previous systemic chemotherapy regimes Life Expectancy > 12 weeks Patients must be at least 3 months from the completion of cranial radiation therapy History of poorly controlled high blood pressure Recent major surgery prior to entry into the study
